name: 1v1 Game
description:
This game is now permanently cancelled due to hard drive failure and loss of files.

This game is in development/beta, and I need your help to come up with ideas of things to add. Down below there is a discussion board, post a topic there with your ideas. I'm thinking about including powerups and need some ideas for powerups too.

The way it works is you have a health, and a power. Flying, shooting and having your melee out uses power. To gain power and health, sit on the charger in the middle.

Controls

DescriptionPlayer 1 KeyPlayer 2 KeyActivate thrusters
WIMove L/RA/DJ/LAim Up/DownQ/EU/OActivate Ranged Weapon/ShootRPActivate Melee WeaponF;
